General.Name: Eurasia Fonciere Investissements Société Anonyme
General.Description: Eurasia Fonciere Investissements Société Anonyme owns, develops, and manages corporate and commercial real estate assets. The company was formerly known as MB Retail Europe and changed its name to Eurasia Fonciere Investissements Société Anonyme in January 2012. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Paris, France. Eurasia Fonciere Investissements Société Anonyme is a subsidiary of Eurasia Groupe SA.
